org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Whitman} ss
In the District of Washington Territory and for the First Judicial District thereof holding terms at Colfax and before the Coronable S.C. B Wingard Judge
Dan Sullivan vs David Marsh Sheriff of Whitman Co W.T.}
Complainant for a Writ of Habeas Corpus

The above named Dan Sullivan complains of said defendant David Mark Sheriff of Whitman County in said Territory and alleges 1st That the said complainant Dan Sullivan is illegally restrained of his liberty in the County Jail of Whitman County in said Territory by the said Defendant David Mark Sheriff of Whitman County and keeper of said Jail
That the cause or pretense of the said restraint and imprisonment
